# Data Source: auth0_flow

Data source to retrieve a specific Auth0 Flow by `id`



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The id of the Flow.

### Read-Only

- `actions` (String) Actions of the flow.
- `name` (String) Name of the flow.
